pages.text: $(li)The Warped Forest is vibrant green biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)No hostile creatures can appear in this biome.$(br)$(li)You can find Warped trees, $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/shroomlight)Shroomlight$(/l), Warped and Crimson Roots, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/warped_fungus)Warped Fungus$(/l) and Crimson Fungus here.

$(li)Some creatures such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/warpbeetle)Warpbeetles$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/shroomloin)Shroomloings$(/l) can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Warped Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
